product_name: Repel Sportsmen Max Formula Pump Spray Insect Repellent - 40 Percent DEET - 6 fl.oz.
long_description: Repel Sportsmen Max Formula(R) Pump spray insect repellent was developed especially for campers, backpackers, fishermen, hunters and outdoor enthusiasts. 40% DEET formula provides effective, long-lasting protection from mosquitoes, gnats, chiggers, ticks, no-see-ums and biting flies. Unscented, nongreasyRepel Sportsmen Max Formula Pump spray insect repellent resists perspiration.
short_description: Repel Sportsmen Max Formula(R) Pump spray insect repellent was developed especially for campers, backpackers, fishermen, hunters and outdoor enthusiasts.
